## About Me

Hi! I'm Tiffany (in the **middle** with my bffs since high school). It's my first semester at Baruch College as a MS Statistics grad student, so I'm excited to meet everyone. I went to Binghamton University for my undergrad, but I am a Brooklyn native. I am a matcha enthusiast, novice reader (CURRENTLY READING: A Little Life by Hanya Yanagihara), and a shopaholic.

```{r}
#| echo: false

if(!require("leaflet")){
    options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cloud.r-project.org"))
    install.packages("leaflet")
    stopifnot(require("leaflet"))
}

ny_longitude <- -74.0060
ny_latitude <- +40.7128

baruch_longitude <- -73.9841
baruch_latitude  <- +40.7402

bing_longitude <- -75.9695
bing_latitude <- +42.0894

leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(ny_longitude, ny_latitude, zoom=6) |>
  addPopups(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, 
            "<b>Baruch College</b>") |>
  addPopups(bing_longitude, bing_latitude, 
            "<b>Binghamton University</b>")
```
